title: Add support for the mask element.
body:
This provides support for the mask element used a lot by Sketch when exporting to SVG.
I can't attach the example so here it is:

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<svg width="50px" height="50px" viewBox="0 0 50 50" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
    <!-- Generator: Sketch 47.1 (45422) - http://www.bohemiancoding.com/sketch -->
    <title>icons/vas-plus</title>
    <desc>Created with Sketch.</desc>
    <defs>
        <path d="M28.5,21.5 L40.5,21.5 C42.4329966,21.5 44,23.0670034 44,25 C44,26.9329966 42.4329966,28.5 40.5,28.5 L28.5,28.5 L28.5,40.5 C28.5,42.4329966 26.9329966,44 25,44 C23.0670034,44 21.5,42.4329966 21.5,40.5 L21.5,28.5 L9.5,28.5 C7.56700338,28.5 6,26.9329966 6,25 C6,23.0670034 7.56700338,21.5 9.5,21.5 L21.5,21.5 L21.5,9.5 C21.5,7.56700338 23.0670034,6 25,6 C26.9329966,6 28.5,7.56700338 28.5,9.5 L28.5,21.5 Z" id="path-1"></path>
    </defs>
    <g id="Symbols" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
        <g id="icons/vas-plus">
            <mask id="mask-2" fill="red">
                <use xlink:href="#path-1"></use>
            </mask>
        </g>
    </g>
</svg>
```

comments.author: ylatuya
comments.body: There is another thing that needs to be fixed in other to display correctly SVG's exported by Sketch, which is adding a final rectangle with another mask passed in the group definition. I manually removed it in this example. I will try to fix it too and create another PR

comments.author: ylatuya
comments.body: Before merging this one, I think I need the other patch to render it correctly because a mask does not render anything, it's just used by other elements

comments.author: ylatuya
comments.body: I am closing it until I figure out how to handle masks correctly
